title: Not SURE WHERE TO PUT THIS but its PROMO RELATED
body:
so i lost my first game in promos won my next match, so 2 matches so far then had to remake one played another 3 after that therefore 5 in total now then i lost one and won another meaning i have played a total of 7 matches but on my profile it says 8 out of 10 which means it counted the remake as a game played and a loss

whats wrong? anyone else have similar problem?

replies.body:
if you were the cause of the remake, it counts as a loss.

If not, it may just be a visual bug with the client. See what happens when you reach 10.
Because you were the leaver it counts as a loss
You were the AFK you take a loss for the remake.

Remake â‰  1 Game
Due to the fact that you didn't exceed 7 minutes.

So I have no fucking idea what's wrong.
Did you win the remake or not?

Btw I don't think that the Ranked Games have been patched to get used to the new 'Remake' feature.
